h2_title: Erlang, The Sacred Divinity Boss Fight and Guide
content: This time, he'll shoot a laser beam from his forehead toward you, and duplicates will appear one after the other, pointing beams at you. You can dodge these to build up focus and avoid their attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Erlang,_The_Sacred_Divinity.md', within the main section titled 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity', specifically from the subsection 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
This time, he'll shoot a laser beam from his forehead toward you, and duplicates will appear one after the other, pointing beams at you. You can dodge these to build up focus and avoid their attacks.
